title: Bug via Web Form
description:
**Bug reported via web form**

**Reporter:** Christopher Michael Dobbins

**Description:**
Requests to create a trigger word that will drive autonomous protocol to look at all submitted bugs and start performing fixes autonomously

**Submitted:** 2025-10-29
fix_description: Created AUTOFIX_TRIGGER.py monitoring script. Watches GitHub bugs every 30 seconds for trigger words: AUTOFIX, FIX_ALL_BUGS, AUTO_FIX_NOW. When triggered, creates BUGS_TO_FIX_NOW.json on Desktop with all open bugs for autonomous fixing. Ready to run when Commander activates trigger.
